page.title: 12 PEEBLES FOR SHOPPING
page.content: Peebles has{>100 shops}spread over the 3 Main streets and housing schemes. These range from{DIY}and{delicatessen to several{bakers}and a{furniture shop The consensus of opinion in our survey is that Peebles is adequately served. Busiest shop is {Fine Fare}supermarket with some{80 staff}selling{over 5,000 different brands and a weekly turnover of{Â£70-90,000.}Solway Market Operators hold a weekly Thursday{Open-air Market in East Station Car Park with the type and number of stalls varying between 50-70 depending on the time of year. The stall holders enjoy a brisk trade. Many shops employ{ seasonal staff}to meet the demands of the tourist trade. One of a shop owner's biggest outlays is meeting the annual{Rates Demand.}In 1985 this was very high after recent revaluation. Example {Sclater's Videos (a medium sized High St shop){Â£2040.
